name: Jordache Women's Plus-Size Skinny Denim Capri
categoryPath: Clothing/Women's Plus/Women's Plus Bottoms/Women's Plus Shorts & Capris

reviews.name: Jordache Women's Plus-Size Skinny Denim Capri
reviews.reviewText: Nice and comfortable and I like they show the curves while helping to flatten those 'rough' edges so-to-speak. They look wonderful on and yes, I would buy again!
reviews.title: Jordache Skinny Jeans

reviews.name: Jordache Women's Plus-Size Skinny Denim Capri
reviews.reviewText: Love how they fit just what I have been looking fir!
reviews.title: best fit ever

reviews.name: Jordache Women's Plus-Size Skinny Denim Capri
reviews.reviewText: it has a couple working pockets too..always a plus. stretchy material on large backsides are generally the definition of unattractive..but these are not too bad. and theyare very comfy! the downside of the stretchy is it stretches out by the end of the day. sometimes i need a belt with it.
reviews.title: suprisingly comfortable and attracrive

reviews.name: Jordache Women's Plus-Size Skinny Denim Capri
reviews.reviewText: Bought these online and I'm happy with the purchase. Very comfortable. True to size. A fair price. Good quality denim. I'm totally satisfied with them.
reviews.title: comfortable capris

reviews.name: Jordache Women's Plus-Size Skinny Denim Capri
reviews.reviewText: I found them to run larger - or more fuller, to be exact - than I anticipated, based on the product photo. I don't care for a "skin-tight" fit, because we all know that just looks bad the larger up the size chart one goes (or, we *should* know it, but it seems some did not get the memo), but a close-fitting short can be flattering all the same - I ordered the size I normally do, found it to be roomier than I liked, and as the shorts stretched out during wear I could pull them down without unbuttoning... *That* can be awkward in certain settings... ;) /begin rant: Also - the photo doesn't show the back pocket, but the stitching is... to be indelicate.. something you see on cheap off-brand jeans, a desperate attempt to look 'hip' despite the plus-sizedness of the wearer. Sure, these capris are not expensive - some might say "cheap", but they're Jordache, and the rear pocket stitching is just *ugly*. Plain back pockets - is that too much to ask? /rant over
reviews.title: Give yourself time to return/exchange...
